Class DudeMonster

entity.Character

entity.enemies.DudeMonster

public class DudeMonster extends Enemy
Represents a concrete type of enemy in the game.

    • DudeMonster

      public DudeMonster(float x, float y)
      Constructs a DudeMonster instance at the specified coordinates and predefined attributes.
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate where the DudeMonster spawns
      y - the y-coordinate where the DudeMonster spawns

  • Method Details

    • canSeePlayer

      public boolean canSeePlayer(Level level, Player player)
      Determines if the DudeMonster has a clear line of sight to the player within the level on the same vertical tile and with no obstacles.
      Specified by:
      canSeePlayer in class Enemy
      Parameters:
      level - the current game level, used to determine environmental and positional context
      player - the player instance whose visibility to the DudeMonster is being evaluated
      Returns:
      true if the player is in the same vertical tile as the DudeMonster, within the vision range, and no environmental obstructions block the sightline; false otherwise

    • canAttackPlayer

      public boolean canAttackPlayer(Player player)
      Determines if the DudeMonster can attack the player based on their vertical alignment and horizontal proximity.
      Specified by:
      canAttackPlayer in class Enemy
      Parameters:
      player - the player to analyze attack conditions against
      Returns:
      true if the player is on the same vertical tile and within the attack distance; false otherwise

    • isPlayerInRange

      protected boolean isPlayerInRange(Player player)
      Determines if the player is within the DudeMonster's vision range, based on the horizontal distance between their hitboxes.
      Parameters:
      player - the player whose position is being evaluated
      Returns:
      true if the player is within the DudeMonster's vision range; false otherwise

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage(int damage)
      Reduces the health points of the DudeMonster by damage value. If the DudeMonster's invulnerability time is active, no damage is taken. When health points reach zero, DudeMonster is killed, After taking damage DudeMoster responds by entering chasing state.
      Specified by:
      takeDamage in class Enemy
      Parameters:
      damage - the amount of damage to inflict on the DudeMonster
